text: Bellaflor "Bella" Javier Angara-Castillo (born September 14, 1939), simply known as Bella Angara, is a former member of the Philippine House of Representatives representing the lone district of Aurora.Result of the May 13, 2013 Elections in the Province of Aurora She was governor of Aurora province three times from 2004 to 2013. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1939 births Category:Majority leaders of the House of Representatives of the Philippines Category:Politicians from Calabarzon
title: Bella Angara
